Section.name: About RIET
Section.description:
Rajamahendri Institute of Engineering and Technology, also known as (RIET) was established in the year 2008. The institute is affiliated to JNTUK Kakinada and approved by AICTE, New Delhi and Government of Andhra Pradesh. RIET has successfully completed 10 years in the areas of Teaching, Learning, Evaluation, Research and many more. It’s now in the 11th year of its existence. Management believes in adapting to the changes in advanced technology. It has emerged as the reputed institute in the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada, Andhra Pradesh.
There are six programs offered by the college. Tabulated below are the details for the same:

Click here Rajamahendri Institute of Engineering and Technology Courses
RIET campus has set up a student-centered infrastructure. Listed below are the details for the same:
Wi-Fi
The campus is interconnected with high-speed internet covering Seminar halls, conference rooms, and other areas.
Canteen
With the total capacity of 200 members to dine all at the same time. Separate floors for Vegetarian and Non-Vegetarian food.
Modern Seminar-Halls

Fully air-conditioned Seminar-Halls covering an area of 4000 sq.feet. easily accommodate 500 individuals.
Library

Automated and digital library houses. Collection of over 25,500 volumes and 2680 titles covering the entire range of engineering disciplines.
Lab

More than 400 systems with the latest configuration are connected through LAN with UPS support.
Transport
More than 23 buses are made available to the students and the faculty members.
